title: KHR_gaussian_splatting glTF Mesh Primitive Extension
description: Data defining a 3D Gaussian Splat primitive.

kernel.description: Optional property specifying parameters regarding the kernel used to generate the Gaussians. This property defaults to ellipse.

projection.description: Optional property providing a hint specifying how to project the Gaussians to achieve a perspective correct value. This is a freeform field that defaults to perspective. See the extension specification for further known types.

sortingMethod.description: Optional property providing a hint specifying how to sort the Gaussians during rendering. This is a freeform field defaulting to cameraDistance. See the extension specification for further known types.

colorSpace.description: Optional property specifying the color space of the color attribute. This property defaults to sRGB.
